mapper.select: SELECT re.* FROM ( SELECT r.ID as id, r.E_NAME as eName, r.ER_DATE as postDate, e.E_TYPE as eType, e.E_VIDEO_PATH as eVideoPath, e.E_CONTENT as eContent, e.calories_per_hour FROM exercise_record r JOIN exercies e ON r.E_NAME = e.E_NAME WHERE DATE(ER_DATE) = DATE(NOW()) and ID=#{id} ORDER BY r.ER_DATE DESC ) as re limit 3
